Reviews.Title: “Comfort and Cleanliness @ the Comfort Inn”
Reviews.Author: SecretRomances
Reviews.Content: looking cheap decent night stay nyc saturday night january booked hoped checked 3p immediately lobby free 247 bathroom clean king size bed unlike lot hotel nyc looks bed takes space flat screen tv maker tall dresser hang clothes wooden hangers night stands drawers bed lamps bible safe 2 day inevitable charge iron ironing board view skyscrapers bathroom shampoo lotion 2 bars soap conditioner forget toothbrush razor hotel staff theyll provide whatever bathroom clean tub toilet scrubbed perfection hotel boasts complimentary continental breakfast includes 2 flavored waffles cereal eggs sausages yogurts assortment juices free wifi bring laptop youre staying saturday sunday free street parking comfort inn 10pm starting saturday read sign carefully streets park nearby read signs check time noon hotels 11 stay 89 rate thanks quikbookcom janfeb rates 89 189 march june 289

Reviews.Title: “Good Hotel for Veteran NYC Visitors and Unfussy Travelers”

Reviews.Content: trying visit nyc hotels manhattan expensive unless traveling friends don’t mind staying hostels andor shared bathrooms chunk travel budget spent accommodations price paid 110 night comfort inn convention center bargain allowed additional funds enjoy city’s superb restaurants couple broadway similarly nyc hotels stayed past common expected requirements try staying brooklyn island city subway fare consideration decide stay outside manhattan appropriate comfortable cleaned day due location hotel quiet night believe time stayed manhattan hotel hear traffic below hotel provides free wifi useful reservations getting directions breakfast hotel offers complimentary breakfast huge buffet appropriate budget hotel juices yogurt fruit banana apples oranges boiled eggs bread english muffin batter waffles coffee instant oatmeal cooked sausage sort frittata nights stayed breakfast overly crowded days – space tiny surprise reason grabbed bananas yogurt merry location folks familiar nyc location look little scary blocks nearest metro entrance 8th hotel location easy walk times square theater district walked street catch movie lincoln plaza cinemas hotel walking distance penn station madison square garden interstate bus stops bolt megabus etc… returning hotel night city alert aware surroundings overall hotel stay manhattan own bathroom budget conscious street savvy luxury accommodations middle times square prepare pockets look else plan stay hotel clean quiet rest head city sleeps

Reviews.Author: An0nym0us88
Reviews.Content: stayed walk able distance javits convention little worried stay clean daily housekeeping bedbugs checked decent breakfast free internet free hbo friendly helpful staff 23 blocks 34st macys penn station madison square garden overall decent hotel id stay unless javits convention oh gas station corner 36 taxi fills getting cab easy

Reviews.Title: “ok place to stay”

Reviews.Content: stayed javits center convenient 3 blocks walk convention center 4 floor clean bathrooms breakfast average fruit looks nice close lincoln tunnel entrance nice restaurants walking distance 35 usd cab ride lga

Reviews.Title: “Great New York Experience”
Reviews.Author: 55123Liz
Reviews.Content: staff comfort inn helpful friendly finding hotel getting city middle action excellent value york close penn station coming newark train close hells kitchen lots restaurants

Reviews.Title: “small rooms, average overall”
Reviews.Author: ohmytians
Reviews.Content: 2 double beds literally walk couldnt luggages properly jump beds toilet bathrooms alright housekeeping didnt everyday overflowing garbage days theres elevator time location okay walking distance times square subway terribly near probably business sightseeing

Reviews.Title: “Perfect! the staff amazing and the price too!!!”
Reviews.Author: puffaum
Reviews.Content: exactly expect ny size staff amazing everyhting help serve mood hard snow ate pizza front desk manager night suggest famiglia restaurant pizza nice name sonny enjoy staing hotel location perfect blocks port photo five times square perfect

Reviews.Title: “Excellent for the price”
Reviews.Author: hikeandread
Reviews.Content: reserved time lucked excellent deal whatever price bargain nyc standards smallbut thats expected nyc clean bed comfortable diverter shower fixed day breakfast adequate price waffles hardboiled eggs juice fruit pastries coffeethe usual people front desk employees unfailingly polite helpful

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful value for the price”
Reviews.Author: roystotts
Reviews.Content: hotel located walking distance penn station times square quiet staff friendly efficient excellent continental breakfast freshly waffles fresh fruit plenty coffee juice definitely stay future

Reviews.Title: “Not the best place to stay for bar exam but close location”

Reviews.Content: hotel dirty looking hotel fridge bed comfortable tv satellite horrible reception barely channels watch free wifi internet connection walk starbucks upload exam honor late checkout request requested 4 months prior checkin hotel repairman door 1030pm night 2nd test day claiming phone call running woken sound sleep highly displeased stay else

Reviews.Content: dont normally write reviews warn stay hotel hostel dirty tiny housekeeping staff didnt bother service 2 days 5 requests clean towels fell deaf ears main issue hotel hygiene clean wouldnt minded stayed investigation stayed nicer hotels cheaper worth money plus hotel centrally located

Reviews.Title: “Perfect for foot exploration of Midtown Manhattan”

Reviews.Content: finally booked hotel 5 days flying 2 night refund delayed 48 hours due weather staying 13 nights 15 14th floor view midtown manhattan brisk walk time square seen night empire building flatiron building broadway theatre intrepid sea aviation museum grand central terminal madison square garden penn station subway unlimited 7 day travel worth subway tv quick efficient penn station 34th 8th straight run central park natural history museum beyond north world trade centre beyond south limited mobility hotel bit remote main sights wonderful eating nearby especially skylight diner 34th street 5 minute walk
